archimate:Capability.name: Identification
archimate:Capability.documentation: It supports the identification process of the different actors interacting through the different channels with the DP: customers, prospects, partners, employee, etc. The capability provides mechanisms for creating, importing, maintaining and searching for identities. It includes also the management of external identity (example: Facebook/Google+ id for prospects). Different capabilities or instances can be used to manage authentication for different type of users (i.e. customers, employee and partners)
